ComicInfo.Title: Get on board
ComicInfo.Summary: Albert and Wayne are attacked accidentally by townspeople in northern Michigan. Kirk leaves the airplane for a small city that was a battleground and is surprised by an escaped convict, Clarence. King Zombie takes his army of zombies on a train to head up north in pursuit of a new gate opener. Albert is brought into the camp where John and Stacey are. They find out that a group of humans have taken over a nearby town called Wolverine. If they go through it they know that the humans will attack them for their supplies, horses, guns...and women. They will have to find a way around the town.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-30 15:16:10. [CVDB142999]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Day, Vincent Locke, David Day, Dan Day, Dan Day, Vincent Locke
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan Day, Vincent Locke, Dan Day, Vincent Locke
ComicInfo.Letterer: Susan E. Dorne, Vincent Locke, Susan Dorne, Nate Pride
